itunes:summary:
Joe Biden has record-low approval ratings in the new Quinnipiac poll, Russia's invasion of Ukraine is a mess (though it also might be succeeding), Elon Musk has threatened to take over Twitter though it actually might just be a troll job, China is tightening its grip on its population through COVID lockdowns, and Jussie Smollett released a song about how he's innocent.
